title: "Oracle’s ‘Swiss Army knife’ approach to DBaaS continues to pay off with MySQL HeatWave ML"
excerpt: "But while traditional MySQL databases offer reliability and cost-savings, they have limited reporting and analytics capabilities, low automation potential and zero machine learning ability. Database administrators have overcome this by adding on separate services to perform these tasks in a “right tool for the right job” approach."
